Title: Dead Reckoning
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Erik Mountain, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: Reese finds being saved by Stanton means having a bomb strapped to his chest while he and Snow infiltrate a DoD lab. A flashback shows how she survived the missile attack and Greer makes his first appearance.
